sub_title: Software Engineer | .Net Developer | Backend | Desktop | Embedded Systems
summary:
>Since 2011 working with distributed, and embedded systems, I have know-how and enthusiasm in solving real-world problems using software engineering power. The Software industry, master's degree in Machine Learning, and startup ownership built on me a solid background, that supports me every time I need to face new challenges.

>While in high school, I’d interested me and learned the basic concepts of Pascal. And what started as a hobby, helped me to chose my career. During the last year of university, with some colleagues, we founded a startup aiming to solve hospital cross-infection problem using embedded components, using C, C# .Net and Arduino, and AI components. We won an award: "I2P Latin America Finals - BR" - https://ideatoproductla.org/ 

>Starting in CESAR, I maturated my knowledge in C and C# .Net writing embedded and distributed systems for projects focused on solving real-world problems, such as irrigation control, and telecom. However, an opportunity to be a C# .Net full-stack developer seduced me to Serttel, making me open my mind outside my comfort zone. There, I built, starting from scratch, an traffic lights operational management system that is functioning in 10 Brazilian cities.

>Parallelly to these two industry experiences, I performed my master's degree focused on machine learning (AI) applied in diagnostic aided by computers, feeding my passion for solving real problems and directing my interest to IoT.

>All my background and the affinity with embedded and distributed systems took me to Modular Mining. There, during almost 5 years years, I supported and improved mining and railroad systems, written in Java and C# .Net, dealing daily with planning, requirements definitions, development, and tests. The railroad controlled by our system, Vale EFC, transports more than 120 million tons of loads and more than 350 thousand people every year.

>After almost 10 years of career in Brazil, it was time to bigger flights. This time, Luxoft brought me to the Netherlands to be part of one of the more relevant companies in the world: ASML. Here we support lithography tools ,developed using C# .Net Core, that will print next generation of chips responsible for revolutionize the future.

Language: Portuguese(Native), English(Full Professioal).

Skills/Interests: C#, .Net (+10y), .Net Compact Framework, Visual Studio, SQL Server, C, C++, Java, Machine Learning, AI, Computer Vision, Matlab, IoT, Data Analysis, Arduino, Python, Azure DevOps, CI/CD, TFS, Git, CVS, Scrum, Agile, Linux.

raphael.nobre.almeida@gmail.com or +31 0627561237

awards.title: I2P Latin America Finals - BR | Opportunities Challenge Winnner

projects.title: Gladi - Clean Care
projects.description:
O Clean Care é um produto inovador no combate às infecções hospitalares, pois ele monitora a frequência com que cada funcionário higieniza suas mãos. Vários estudos comprovam que o maior vetor das infecções hospitalares são as mãos dos profissionais de saúde, e que a maneira mais simples e eficaz de combater esse mal é a higienização das mãos da maneira e na frequência corretas.

A frequência da higienização é monitorada através de um sistema de indentificação de rádio frequência (RFID) contido no lavatório e nos crachás. A presença do funcionário por um determinado tempo junto ao lavatório indica que o mesmo higienizou a sua mão. Dessa forma um sistema integrado dará informações de frequência de cada funcionário de maneira individual. O sistema é de fácil instalação e fácil uso por parte dos funcionários do CCIHs, e não afeta a dinâmica do hospital

projects.title: USTBridge
projects.description: Developing of a device gateway between ISDN telephonic calls and VoIP. When connected to a PC USB port, the device is capable of provide an interface to a PABX, effectively turning the PC into a telephonic line trunk.

profile_positions.description:
COMPANY:
• ASML is an innovation leader in the semiconductor industry. We provide chipmakers with everything they need – hardware, software and services – to mass produce patterns on silicon through lithography.

RESULTS:
• As Senior Software Engineer, I am part of a scrum team composed also by Physics where we deliver new functionalities in a huge monolithic solution written in C# .Net Core, besides code maintenance and researches. We base all of our decisions in SOLID. Another responsibility is to create and maintain unit and integration test, besides taking care of functional documents.
USED TECHNOLOGIES:
• C#, .Net, .Net Core, Visual Studio, Git
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer Contractor
Senior Software Engineer for ASML Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
COMPANY:
• Modular Mining is the global leader in mine management technology and a wholly-owned subsidiary of KOMATSU Ltd. Our innovative technology powers mine operations in every corner of the globe.

RESULTS:
• As Team Leader, I am improving an onboard computer application written in C# .Net that helps the machinist guiding the equipment. I’ve ported code from .Net Compact Framework (Windows CE) to .Net Framework 4.7, removing deprecated framework dependency.
• I participated as the unique developer, responsible for improving a dispatching system coded in Java, with High Availability requirement. I managed to reduce memory consumption at the core module by more than 80%.

USED TECHNOLOGIES:
• C#, .Net, .Net Compact Framework, Visual Studio, Azure DevOps, Git, Java, CVS, Maven, MySQL, Memory Analyzer, Linux.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
COMPANY:
• Serttel, which has more than 700 employees, offers solutions to several capitals of Brazil aimed at intelligent traffic light management, traffic monitoring and inspection, and public parking management.

RESULTS:
• I'd never worked with web systems before, however, I built, starting from scratch, a traffic lights operational management web system, designed using C# .Net, which is operating in 10 Brazilian cities and managing more than 2000 traffic lights.

USED TECHNOLOGIES:
• C#, .Net, MVC, Microsoft SQL Server, Visual Studio, Git.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
COMPANY:
• CESAR is a non-profit research and innovation center based in the city of Recife, Pernambuco. Besides, It is an integral part and anchor institution of Porto Digital, one of the largest technology parks in Brazil.

RESULTS:
• Using C# .Net, I wrote a Windows desktop application that configures and tests a Motorola radio family.
• Coding in C for an ARM microcontroller, besides all improvements, I augmented the precision in the calculation of speed in an irrigation system.
• Development in C for Telephony area, where I implemented a software bridge between USB and sPort.

USED TECHNOLOGIES:
• C, Microcontrollers (Arm, Blackfin), Osciloscopy, C#, Visual Studio, BlackPhin board, Python.
